siteMetadata.title: Blog by Eleanor Mollett
siteMetadata.subtitle: Delivery manager currently working for NICE in Manchester. Previously DWP, HMRC and the Home Office

frontmatter.title: Balancing long term vision with short term delivery priorities
frontmatter.description: I’ve been thinking recently about how our team balances the effort we put in to putting together designs for the long term vision for our service, with the work we need to do now to deliver our minimum viable product and the private beta of our service.
